name: @cf/openai/whisper
description: Whisper is a general-purpose speech recognition model. It is trained on a large dataset of diverse audio and is also a multitasking model that can perform multilingual speech recognition, speech translation, and language identification.

task.name: Automatic Speech Recognition
task.description: Automatic speech recognition (ASR) models convert a speech signal, typically an audio input, to text.

audio.description: An array of integers that represent the audio data constrained to 8-bit unsigned integer values

source_lang.description: The language of the recorded audio

target_lang.description: The language to translate the transcription into. Currently only English is supported.

start.description: The second this word begins in the recording

end.description: The ending second when the word completes
